info.title: Pathway Analysis Service
info.description: Provides an API for pathway over-representation and expression analysis as well as species comparison tool

get.summary: Downloads those identifiers found for a given analysis and a certain resource
get.description: The identifiers are filtered by the selected resource. The filename is the one to be suggested in the download window.

parameters.description: The token associated with the data to download
parameters.name: token

parameters.description: the file name for the downloaded information
parameters.name: filename

404.description: No result corresponding to the token was found

410.description: Result deleted due to a new data release

get.summary: Downloads a list of the not found identifiers
get.description: Those identifiers from the user sample that are not present up to the current data version. The filename is the one to be suggested in the download window.

parameters.description: The token associated with the data to download
parameters.name: token

parameters.description: the file name for the downloaded information
parameters.name: filename

404.description: No result corresponding to the token was found

410.description: Result deleted due to a new data release

get.summary: Downloads all hit pathways for a given analysis
get.description: The results are filtered by the selected resource. The filename is the one to be suggested in the download window.

parameters.description: The token associated with the data to download
parameters.name: token

parameters.description: the file name for the downloaded information
parameters.name: filename

404.description: No result corresponding to the token was found

410.description: Result deleted due to a new data release

get.summary: Analyse the identifier over the different species in the database
get.description: Use page and pageSize to reduce the amount of data retrieved. Use sortBy and order to sort the result by your preferred option. The resource field will filter the results to show only those corresponding to the preferred molecule type (TOTAL includes all the different molecules type)

parameters.description: The identifier of the element to be retrieved
parameters.name: id

get.summary: Analyse the identifier over the different species in the database and projects the result to Homo Sapiens
get.description: The projection is calculated by the orthologous slot in the Reactome database. Use page and pageSize to reduce the amount of data retrieved. Use sortBy and order to sort the result by your preferred option. The resource field will filter the results to show only those corresponding to the preferred molecule type (TOTAL includes all the different molecules type)

parameters.description: The identifier of the element to be retrieved
parameters.name: id

post.summary: Analyse the post identifiers over the different species
post.description: Use page and pageSize to reduce the amount of data retrieved. Use sortBy and order to sort the result by your preferred option. The resource field will filter the results to show only those corresponding to the preferred molecule type (TOTAL includes all the different molecules type)

parameters.description: Identifiers to analyse followed by their expression (when applies)
parameters.name: input

post.summary: Analyse the identifiers in the file over the different species
post.description: Use page and pageSize to reduce the amount of data retrieved. Use sortBy and order to sort the result by your preferred option. The resource field will filter the results to show only those corresponding to the preferred molecule type (TOTAL includes all the different molecules type)

parameters.description: A file with the data to be analysed
parameters.name: file

413.description: The file size is larger than the maximum configured size (10MB)

post.summary: Analyse the identifiers in the file over the different species and projects the result to Homo Sapiens
post.description: The projection is calculated by the orthologous slot in the Reactome database. Use page and pageSize to reduce the amount of data retrieved. Use sortBy and order to sort the result by your preferred option. The resource field will filter the results to show only those corresponding to the preferred molecule type (TOTAL includes all the different molecules type)

parameters.description: A file with the data to be analysed
parameters.name: file

413.description: The file size is larger than the maximum configured size (10MB)

post.summary: Analyse the post identifiers over the different species and projects the result to Homo Sapiens
post.description: The projection is calculated by the orthologous slot in the Reactome database. Use page and pageSize to reduce the amount of data retrieved. Use sortBy and order to sort the result by your preferred option. The resource field will filter the results to show only those corresponding to the preferred molecule type (TOTAL includes all the different molecules type)

parameters.description: Identifiers to analyse followed by their expression (when applies)
parameters.name: input

post.summary: Analyse the identifiers contained in the provided url over the different species
post.description: Use page and pageSize to reduce the amount of data retrieved. Use sortBy and order to sort the result by your preferred option. The resource field will filter the results to show only those corresponding to the preferred molecule type (TOTAL includes all the different molecules type)

parameters.description: A URL pointing to the data to be analysed
parameters.name: url

413.description: The file size is larger than the maximum configured size (10MB)

422.description: The provided URL is not processable

post.summary: Analyse the identifiers contained in the provided url over the different species and projects the result to Homo Sapiens
post.description: The projection is calculated by the orthologous slot in the Reactome database. Use page and pageSize to reduce the amount of data retrieved. Use sortBy and order to sort the result by your preferred option. The resource field will filter the results to show only those corresponding to the preferred molecule type (TOTAL includes all the different molecules type)

parameters.description: A URL pointing to the data to be analysed
parameters.name: url

413.description: The file size is larger than the maximum configured size (10MB)

422.description: The provided URL is not processable

get.summary: Compares Homo sapiens to the specified species
get.description: Use page and pageSize to reduce the amount of data retrieved. Use sortBy and order to sort the result by your preferred option. The resource field will filter the results to show only those corresponding to the preferred molecule type (TOTAL includes all the different molecules type)

parameters.description: The dbId of the species to compare to
parameters.name: species

404.description: Species identifier does not match with any of the species in the current data

get.summary: Returns the result associated with the token
get.description: Use page and pageSize to reduce the amount of data retrieved. Use sortBy and order to sort the result by your preferred option. The resource field will filter the results to show only those corresponding to the preferred molecule type (TOTAL includes all the different molecules type)

parameters.description: The token associated with the data to query
parameters.name: token

404.description: No result corresponding to the token was found

410.description: Result deleted due to a new data release

post.summary: Returns the result for the pathway ids sent by post (when they are present in the original result)
post.description: For a given list of pathway identifiers (dbId) it will retrieve a list containing those that are present in the result (with the results for the indicated molecule type)

parameters.description: The token associated with the data to query
parameters.name: token

parameters.description: A comma separated list with the identifiers of the pathways of interest (NOTE: is plain text, not json)
parameters.name: input

404.description: No result corresponding to the token was found

410.description: Result deleted due to a new data release

parameters.description: The token associated with the data to query
parameters.name: token

parameters.description: The dbId of the species to filter the result
parameters.name: species

404.description: No result corresponding to the token was found

410.description: Result deleted due to a new data release

get.summary: Returns a list of the identifiers not found for a given token
get.description: Those identifiers that have not been found in the Reactome database

parameters.description: The token associated with the data to query
parameters.name: token

404.description: No result corresponding to the token was found

410.description: Result deleted due to a new data release

get.summary: Returns the page where the corresponding pathway is taking into account the passed parameters
get.description: Useful when implementing UI with tables showing the results in a page way and the user needs to know in which page a certain pathway is present for a given set of sorting and filtering options.

parameters.description: The token associated with the data to query
parameters.name: token

parameters.description: The database identifier of the pathway of interest
parameters.name: pathway

404.description: No result corresponding to the token was found

410.description: Result deleted due to a new data release

post.summary: Returns the reaction ids of the pathway ids sent by post that are present in the original result
post.description: It filters the submitted list and retrieves back only those that at least one of the participating molecules has been hit with the user submitted data.

parameters.description: The token associated with the data to query
parameters.name: token

parameters.description: A comma separated list with the identifiers of the pathways of interest (NOTE: is plain text, not json)
parameters.name: input

404.description: No result corresponding to the token was found

410.description: Result deleted due to a new data release

get.summary: Returns the reaction ids of the provided pathway id that are present in the original result
get.description: For a given pathway it returns the identifiers (dbId) of the reactions in the pathway that have been hit with the sample taking into account their participating molecules.

parameters.description: The token associated with the data to query
parameters.name: token

parameters.description: The database identifier of the pathway of interest
parameters.name: pathway

404.description: No result corresponding to the token was found

410.description: Result deleted due to a new data release

get.summary: Returns the resources summary associated with the token
get.description: A summary of the molecules type associated to the submitted data.

parameters.description: The token associated with the data to query
parameters.name: token

404.description: No result corresponding to the token was found

410.description: Result deleted due to a new data release

get.summary: Returns a summary of the contained identifiers for a pathway in the result for a given token
get.description: The identifiers submitted by the user that have a match in Reactome database. It also retrieves the mapping to the main identifiers for those that have been found.

parameters.description: The token associated with the data to query
parameters.name: token

parameters.description: The dbId of the pathway of interest
parameters.name: pathway

404.description: No result corresponding to the token was found

410.description: Result deleted due to a new data release
